Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial release: Galamsey Monitor Platform

A comprehensive web platform for monitoring and combating illegal
small-scale mining \(galamsey\) in Ghana.

Features:
- Dashboard with real-time statistics and interactive map
- Incident reporting system with GPS geolocation support
- Water quality monitoring for Ghana''s rivers
- Data visualization with charts and analytics
- Satellite imagery integration \(Sentinel Hub, Google Earth\)
- Education and awareness resources
- RESTful API for all data operations

Tech Stack:
- Next.js 16 with App Router
- TypeScript for type safety
- Tailwind CSS v4 for styling
- SQLite database with better-sqlite3
- Leaflet for interactive maps
- Recharts for data visualization

Covers all 16 regions of Ghana with sample data for
Ashanti, Western, Eastern, and Central regions.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
